attributes.action: Adoption & False Accusations of Child Abuse.
attributes.additional_details: We call upon David Cameron, Tim Loughton, Earl Freddie Howe, Dominic Greive, Caroline Spellman, Dr Liam Fox and others, who in opposition understood the issue of FALSE ALLEGATIONS OF CHILD ABUSE, to institute a thorough and urgent investigation of this issue; and to postpone any speeding up of adoptions until this issue has been dealt with. At the moment there would be too much danger of the tragedy of children being adopted before their wrongly accused parents have chance to prove their innocence.
